summary:
Turn Whiterun into a Archery Practice Field with \"Whiterun Archery Targets\"
For Role-Players and for Archers looking to improve their skills.
Targets are placed in strategic locations.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/lMobr.jpg[/img]


[img]http://i.imgur.com/VDFhU.jpg[/img]
As witnessed during several dragon attacks to the city of Whiterun, few townspeople are capable with a bow and arrow. Because Archers are key to bringing down a dragon, the Jarl has decided to place Archery Targets around the town for residents to practice their skills.

The Jarl has decided to place targets in only the lower half of Whiterun to \"test the waters\". If the targets gain large approval from the townsfolk, then the Jarl may consider adding extra targets to the other parts of Whiterun. In fact, he may spread the word of it\'s effectiveness to [b]other cities.[/b]
[b](So if you like this mod, please endorse or leave supporting comments for future expansions!)[/b]


[img]http://i.imgur.com/zwyiK.jpg[/img]
This mod adds a total of 10 targets.
It is for role-playing characters who enjoy the challenge of striking a bulls-eye on a hidden target several hundred feet away. For characters who know exactly where their arrow will hit before they release. For people who savor the thunk of arrow on wood.
If you enjoy using the bow in Skyrim, or are Wood Elves at heart, then this mod is for you.

Some targets are more obscure than others, and I have tried to have a mix of both challenging and simpler targets.


[img]http://i.imgur.com/7H1qU.jpg[/img]
IT IS HIGHLY RECOMMENDED to use [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9558]City Forests and Landscape V2 Trees.[/url] I have maximized compatibility with this mod so the targets integrate seamlessly.


[img]http://i.imgur.com/GRsB0.jpg[/img]
Please drop the downloaded .ESP inside your Skyrim Directory under \"Data\".
Make sure \"Whiterun Archery Targets - KDC.esp\" is ticked in the NMM, or under \"Data Files\" in the Skyrim Launcher.


[img]http://i.imgur.com/ul6O9.jpg[/img]
Remove \"Whiterun Archery Targets - KDC.esp\" from your Data folder.


[img]http://i.imgur.com/iN2qb.jpg[/img]
v1.0 First Release. 10 Targets.


[img]http://i.imgur.com/Xh7EH.jpg[/img]
This will be my FIRST mod that I have ever released.
This mod was built with the CK released by Bethesda.
If you have any comments or suggestions, feel free to post them.
author: kevinsterable - KDC
